verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> LORD, <WH3068> I cry <WH7121> unto thee: make haste <WH2363> unto me; give ear <WH238> unto my voice, <WH6963> when I cry <WH7121> unto thee.
Let my prayer <WH8605> be set forth <WH3559> before <WH6440> thee as incense; <WH7004> and the lifting up <WH4864> of my hands <WH3709> as the evening <WH6153> sacrifice. <WH4503>
Set <WH7896> a watch, <WH8108> O LORD, <WH3068> before my mouth; <WH6310> keep <WH5341> <WH5921> the door <WH1817> of my lips. <WH8193>

Incline <WH5186> not <WH408> my heart <WH3820> to any evil <WH7451> thing, <WH1697> to practice <WH5953> wicked <WH7562> works <WH5949> with <WH854> men <WH376> that work <WH6466> iniquity: <WH205> and let me not <WH1077> eat <WH3898> of their dainties. <WH4516>

Let the righteous <WH6662> smite <WH1986> me; it shall be a kindness: <WH2617> and let him reprove <WH3198> me; it shall be an excellent <WH7218> oil, <WH8081> which shall not <WH408> break <WH5106> my head: <WH7218> for <WH3588> yet <WH5750> my prayer <WH8605> also shall be in their calamities. <WH7451>
When their judges <WH8199> are overthrown <WH8058> in stony <WH5553> places, <WH3027> they shall hear <WH8085> my words; <WH561> for <WH3588> they are sweet. <WH5276>
Our bones <WH6106> are scattered <WH6340> at the grave's <WH7585> mouth, <WH6310> as when <WH3644> one cutteth <WH6398> and cleaveth <WH1234> wood upon the earth. <WH776>
But <WH3588> mine eyes <WH5869> are unto <WH413> thee, O GOD <WH3069> the Lord: <WH136> in thee is my trust; <WH2620> leave not my soul destitute. <WH6168> <WH408> <WH5315>
Keep <WH8104> me from <WH4480> <WH3027> the snares <WH6341> which they have laid <WH3369> for me, and the gins <WH4170> of the workers <WH6466> of iniquity. <WH205>
Let the wicked <WH7563> fall <WH5307> into their own nets, <WH4364> whilst <WH5704> that I <WH595> withal <WH3162> escape. <WH5674>
